This widget supports responsive which will follow the screen size used.<br><br><br><div><a href="https://googleweblight.com/?lite_url=https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hbtg9alS3Do/WL8RWNRgfsI/AAAAAAAAE6Q/m5U6jz7Z7VEsbLKdLNpzDkc8FgnBPYmkQCLcB/s1600/Cara%252BMembuat%252BRecent%252BPost%252BWidget%252BBerwarna.png&amp;ts=1493301389&amp;sig=AJsQQ1AQU8SMMHerpI_I0N-qqwGUAPgVlQ" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow"> <img alt="Cara Membuat Recent Post Widget Berwarna" id="-wl-ii0" src="data:image/webp;base64,"> </a></div><br>For live view of this widget can visit my friend pen below:<br><br><iframe align="center" frameborder="no" height="500px" name="results" scrolling="auto" src="https://source.l3n4r0x.cf/php/codepen.php?user=dimaslanjaka&amp;id=LyxJKd&amp;tab=result&amp;h=500" width="100%"><br /></iframe><br><br>How, interested to install it on the blog? For my friend who want to<br>install it, I will give the tutorial below<br><h4><b>How to Make Recent Post Widget Color</b></h4>Go to Blogger &gt; Themes &gt; Click the Edit HTML button<br>Include material icon before &lt;/head&gt; like this:<br><pre>&lt;link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/&gt;</pre>Then add the CSS code<br>below before the code ]]&gt; &lt;/b:skin&gt; or &lt;/ style&gt;<br><br><pre>.gravityfeatured{display:flex;margin:0 auto 20px auto;width:100%;overflow:hidden;max-width:970px}<br>.gravfeatureditem{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.02);display:block;position:relative;float:left;overflow:hidden;height:220px;width:25%}<br>.gravfeatureditem .gracontent{background:#3498db;display:block;position:absolute;z-index:6;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;transform:translate(0,0);opacity:1;visibility:visible;transition:all .3s}<br>.gravfeatureditem:hover .gracontent{opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transform:translate(0,60px)}<br>.gravfeatureditem .gracontent h3{font-size:14px;color:#fff;padding:15px;margin:0;text-align:center;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis}<br>.gravfeatureditem .feat-img{width:100%;height:100%;background-size:cover;background-position:50%}<br>.gravfeatureditem a{display:block;color:rgba(255,255,255,1);position:relative;vertical-align:bottom;z-index:5;height:100%;transition:all .3s}<br>.gravfeatureditem a:before{content:'';background:#3498db;width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;z-index:3;top:0;opacity:0;transition:background 0.3s linear,opacity 0.3s linear}<br>.gravfeatureditem.first a:before,.gravfeatureditem.first .gracontent{background:#56a8df}<br>.gravfeatureditem.second a:before,.gravfeatureditem.second .gracontent{background:#e49148}<br>.gravfeatureditem.third a:before,.gravfeatureditem.third .gracontent{background:#5bccb6}<br>.gravfeatureditem.fourth a:before,.gravfeatureditem.fourth .gracontent{background:#f5b44c}<br>.gravfeatureditem a:hover:before{opacity:0.9;}<br>.gravfeatureditem a:after{content:'textsms';font-family:Material Icons;position:absolute;z-index:3;font-size:3rem;top:32%;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;color:#fff;text-align:center;transform:translate(0,-60px);animation:jellygrav .6s linear;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transition:all .3s}<br>.gravfeatureditem:hover a:after{opacity:1;visibility:visible;transform:translate(0,0)}<br>@media screen and (max-width:826px){<br>.gravfeatureditem{width:50%}<br>.gravfeatureditem.third,.gravfeatureditem.fourth{display:none}}<br>@media screen and (max-width:641px){<br>.gravfeatureditem{width:100%}<br>.gravfeatureditem.second,.gravfeatureditem.third,.gravfeatureditem.fourth{display:none}}</pre><br><blockquote><i>NOTE:</i> Widget uses CSS library icon from Material Icons, if my friend uses Fontawesome. Replace the CSS code below.</blockquote><pre>.gravfeatureditem a:after{content:<mark style="background-color: rgb(52, 152, 219) !important; border-radius: 2px; border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-family: 'Source Code Pro', Menlo, Consolas, Monaco, monospace; font-size: 13.2799997329712px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 25.5px; margin: 0px 2px; padding: 2px; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;">'textsms'</mark>;font-family:<mark style="background-color: rgb(52, 152, 219) !important; border-radius: 2px; border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-family: 'Source Code Pro', Menlo, Consolas, Monaco, monospace; font-size: 13.2799997329712px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 25.5px; margin: 0px 2px; padding: 2px; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;">Material Icons</mark>;position:absolute;z-index:3;font-size:3rem;top:32%;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;color:#fff;text-align:center;transform:translate(0,0);animation:jellygrav .6s linear;opacity:1;visibility:visible;transition:all .3s}</pre><span class="notranslate">The next step, add the code below just before the code&nbsp;<kbd style="border: 0px none rgb(40, 161, 240); color: #28a1f0;">&lt;/body&gt;</kbd>&nbsp;</span><br><pre>&lt;script type='text/javascript'&gt;<br>//&lt;![CDATA[<br>// Recent Post<br>function getPostUrl(a){for(var b=0;b&lt;a.link.length;b++)if("alternate"==a.link[b].rel){var c=a.link[b].href;return c}}function getPostPublishDate(a){var b=a.published.$t,c=b.split("-")[2].substring(0,2),d=b.split("-")[1],e=b.split("-")[0],f=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","Octobor","November","December"],g=f[d-1],h=g+" "+c+", "+e;return b?h:""}function getPostCategory(a){var b=a.category;b&amp;&amp;(b=a.category[0].term);var c='&lt;div class="category-wrapper"&gt;&lt;a class="category" href="/search/label/'+b+'?max-results=10"&gt;'+b+"&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";return b?c:""}function Slider(a){for(var c=(new Array,""),d=a.feed.entry.length,e=0;e&lt;d;e++){var f=a.feed.entry[e],g=f.title.$t,h=getPostUrl(f),l=(f.author[0].name.$t,getPostPublishDate(f),getPostCategory(f),f.category[0].term),m=a.feed.entry[e].content.$t,n=$("&lt;div&gt;").html(m);if(m.indexOf("//www.youtube.com/embed/")&gt;-1)var o=a.feed.entry[e].media$thumbnail.url,p=o;else if(m.indexOf("&lt;img")&gt;-1)var q=n.find("img:first").attr("src"),p=q;else var p=no_image;0==e&amp;&amp;(c=c+'&lt;div class="gravfeatureditem first"&gt;&lt;div class="gracontent"&gt;&lt;h3&gt;'+g+'&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a href="'+h+'"&gt;&lt;div class="feat-img" style="background-image:url('+p+');"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'),1==e&amp;&amp;(c=c+'&lt;div class="gravfeatureditem second"&gt;&lt;div class="gracontent"&gt;&lt;h3&gt;'+g+'&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a href="'+h+'"&gt;&lt;div class="feat-img" style="background-image:url('+p+');"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'),2==e&amp;&amp;(c=c+'&lt;div class="gravfeatureditem third"&gt;&lt;div class="gracontent"&gt;&lt;h3&gt;'+g+'&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a href="'+h+'"&gt;&lt;div class="feat-img" style="background-image:url('+p+');"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'),3==e&amp;&amp;(c=c+'&lt;div class="gravfeatureditem fourth"&gt;&lt;div class="gracontent"&gt;&lt;h3&gt;'+g+'&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a href="'+h+'"&gt;&lt;div class="feat-img" style="background-image:url('+p+');"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;')}slider.html('&lt;div class="gravityfeatured"&gt;'+c+"&lt;/div&gt;"),$(".gravityfeatured").find(".feat-img").each(function(){$(this).attr("style",function(a,b){return b.replace("/default.jpg","/mqdefault.jpg")}).attr("style",function(a,b){return b.replace("s72-c","s1600")}).attr("style",function(a,b){return b.replace("s320","s1600")}).attr("style",function(a,b){return b.replace("s400","s1600")}).attr("style",function(a,b){return b.replace("s640","s1600")})})}var slider=$("#gravityfeatured .widget-content"),sliderContent=slider.text().trim();"no"!==sliderContent.toLowerCase().trim()&amp;&amp;'"no"'!==sliderContent.toLowerCase()&amp;&amp;""!==sliderContent?"[recent]"!==sliderContent?$.ajax({url:"/feeds/posts/default/-/"+sliderContent+"?alt=json-in-script&amp;max-results=4",type:"get",dataType:"jsonp",success:function(a){Slider(a)}}):$.ajax({url:"/feeds/posts/default?alt=json-in-script&amp;max-results=4",type:"get",dataType:"jsonp",success:function(a){Slider(a)}}):$("#slider").remove();<br>//]]&gt;<br>&lt;/script&gt;</pre>After that next step, add the HTML widget below freely between <kbd>&lt;body&gt;</kbd> and <mark>&lt;/ body&gt;</mark> code<br><pre>&lt;b:section class='gravityfeaturedz' id='gravityfeatured' showaddelement='yes'&gt;<br>  &lt;b:widget id='HTML94' locked='false' title='' type='HTML' version='1'&gt;<br>    &lt;b:includable id='main'&gt;<br>  &lt;div class='widget-content'&gt;<br>    &lt;data:content/&gt;<br>  &lt;/div&gt;<br>&lt;div class='clear'/&gt;<br>&lt;/b:includable&gt;<br>  &lt;/b:widget&gt;<br>&lt;/b:section&gt;</pre>Save template&gt; Click Layout&gt; Refresh Blogger page (click OK)&gt; Add d code below within the widget you added&gt; Click Save Widget <br><br><code>[recent]</code> <br><br>See the results on your blog. <br><br>Easy enough is not it? Such is the tutorial for this opportunity, thank you for visiting.
